titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4500 SE 28th Street, Del City, Oklahoma, as the James Robert Kalsu Post Office Building.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/14/2015--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4500 SE 28th Street, Del City, Oklahoma, as the James Robert Kalsu Post Office Building.
